content: Stream created by Ward Weistra.

A place to share ideas and best practices around the Firely Query Language (or FHIR Query Language, if others want to implement it too).

  • Documentation is here: https://simplifier.net/docs/fql
  • The FQL playground is here: https://simplifier.net/fql

It can currently be used for tables in Simplifier Implementation Guides and for querying from the FQL playground and, on the command-line, from Firely Terminal
Here's a blog post by @Matthijs van der Wielen on how to use FQL in an Implementation Guide to create dynamic IGs: https://blog.fire.ly/blog/how-to-build-a-dynamic-fhir-implementation-guide/
